attributes.action: Government should consider a Brexit negotiating team from the business community
attributes.background: Government has shown that over the past two years they have been incapable of negotiating a deal with the intransigent EU negotiating team. The UK has numerous successful business leaders with past negotiating experience to deliver a deal that offers UK Inc an acceptable deal

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for someone to be given a job.
